        public void addOrder()
        Add Order
        Specified by:
        addOrder in interface SimonSaysInterface
        Ensure:
        A step for the user to follow is added to the list.
        Require:

      • size

        public int size()
        Size
        Specified by:
        size in interface SimonSaysInterface
        Returns:
        The int value of how many steps are required for the player to follow.
        Ensure:
        The list of steps are counted.
        Require:
        A list of steps for the user to follow has been created.

      • isMatch

        public boolean isMatch(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> inputOrder)
        Is Match
        Specified by:
        isMatch in interface SimonSaysInterface
        Parameters:
        inputOrder - The list of steps entered by the player is passed.
        Returns:
        A truth value is returned based on whether or not the player successfully followed the order of steps.
        Ensure:
        Check the two lists (player input and required steps) to determine if the player entered all the correct steps.
        Require:
        A list of the players input is created, as well as the list of required steps for the player to follow is created.

      • play

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> play()
        Play
        Specified by:
        play in interface SimonSaysInterface
        Returns:
        A list including the first step for the player to follow is returned.
        Ensure:
        The list of steps is able to be returned.
        Require:
        A valid list for steps is created.
